ModMetaData.name: [XND] Targeting Modes
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Current Version: v1.1.5 (27th November 2018)\n\nV.A.T.S for RimWorld! Allow your colonists, obedient animals and even some raiders to prioritize targeting certain body part groups of their enemies. Shoot those heads off in style!
